projects.name: Taskie: An AI-powered project manager
projects.description: A multi-agent project manager, that can perform tasks like collecting updates, creating Linear tickets, and communicating with stakeholders.

projects.name: Quality Bot
projects.description: A Slack bot that pull Linear tickets triaged in the last week, reads description and comments and prepares a detailed report on product quality by leveraging GPT4, helping engineering teams identify patterns in quality issues.

projects.name: Hire Stack
projects.description: An AI recruiter that sorts and stack ranks a list of resumes for any job, by evaluating them based on criteria that you control.

projects.name: Archived Projects
projects.description: Old projects that I did years ago. Not maintained.
